#summary how to install the flashbuilder for linux
#labels install,howto,amd64,i386

= Introduction =

how to install the Adobe Flash Builderâ„¢ 4 For Linux.

= System Requirements =

 * eclipse 3.4.2+
 * java 1.5+

= Details =


  * Download the file from here:[http://mirror.apptor.cn/Adobe_Flash_Builder_4_Linux.tar.bz2],extract it.for example,extract to:/home/feiy/FlexBuilder4Linux 
  * in eclipse,select Help->Software Updates->Manage Configuration(if u no this menu,todo:select Window->Preferences->General->Capabilities-> checked Classis Update) ->right click->add->extension location->select the path :/home/feiy/FlexBuilder4Linux 
  * submit,reboot eclipse.
  * ~~amd64,to view http://labs.adobe.com/technologies/flex/flexbuilder_linux/releasenotes.html#install : Installing Flex Builder Linux on 64-bit Operating Systems,after do follow it ,to view [HowToFixedFB4Frozen]~~
  * current released,fb4linux work in amd64 & i386,don't need the ia32 jre in amd64 system.
